name: Museum Builder Demo
description:
Build your very own space museum in this first demo for my museum game!

Place item - Mouse on grid and left click

Drag wall/floor - Mouse on grid, hold left click and drag mouse

Select item - Mouse over button and left click

Scroll through items - Page Up/Page Down buttons or mouse over items and scroll wheel

Remove Mode - Hold R key or select remove button in UI

Move - Arrow keys

Give me all your feedback! I really want to improve this demo and expand it so all feedback is crucial.

  • Fill out the short survey: Survey Link
  • Screenshot your museum and tweet it at me @Skeffles with #museumgame
  • Comment on the itch page
  • Comment on my latest devlog: YouTube Channel

View the roadmap on trello: Trello Link
